text: Jean Grenet (12 July 1939 – 23 February 2021) was a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of France from 1993 to 1997 and again from 1992 to 2012. He represented the Pyrénées-Atlantiques department. Grenet was a member of the Radical Party. From 1995 to 2014, he was Mayor of Bayonne, Pyrénées-Atlantiques. He was born in Bayonne. Grenet died on 23 February 2021 in Bayonne, aged 81.Bayonne: l’ancien maire Jean Grenet est décédé ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:People from Bayonne
title: Jean Grenet
